Uses of Interface
ch.lambdaj.function.aggregate.Aggregator

  • Packages that use Aggregator 
    Package Description
    ch.lambdaj  
    ch.lambdaj.function.aggregate  

    • Uses of Aggregator in ch.lambdaj

      Methods in ch.lambdaj with parameters of type Aggregator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> T Lambda.aggregate(Object iterable, Aggregator<T> aggregator)
      Aggregates the items in the given iterable using the given Aggregator.
      static <T,A> T Lambda.aggregate(Object iterable, Aggregator<T> aggregator, A argument)
      For each item in the given iterable collects the value defined by the given argument and then aggregates them iterable using the given Aggregator.
      static <T,A> T Lambda.aggregateFrom(Iterable<T> iterable, Aggregator<A> aggregator)
      Returns a lambda function defined as:

      aggregateFrom : (aggregator, iterable) => lambda : (convert : object => object) => object

      It is then possibly to curry this function by selecting the convert function that defines how each item must be converted in the object to be aggregated.
      static <T,A> T Lambda.aggregateFrom(Iterable<T> iterable, Class<?> clazz, Aggregator<A> aggregator)
      Returns a lambda function defined as:

      aggregateFrom : (aggregator, iterable) => lambda : (convert : object => object) => object

      It is then possibly to curry this function by selecting the convert function that defines how each item must be converted in the object to be aggregated.

    • Uses of Aggregator in ch.lambdaj.function.aggregate

      Classes in ch.lambdaj.function.aggregate that implement Aggregator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Avg
      An aggregator calculating numbers' average
      class  Chooser<T>
      An abstract class that define the behaviour af an Aggregator which aggregates two items of a collection just by choosing one of them.
      class  ChooserOnArgument<T,A>
      An Aggregator that chooses between two item based on the value of an argument operation invoked on them.
      class  Concat
      An Aggregator that concats String or more generally the String representation of a given Object
      class  InitializedPairAggregator<T>
      A PairAggregator that is initialized to the value of its idempotent item.
      class  Max<T>
      A chooser of the maximum value between two comparable
      class  MaxOnArgument<T,A>
      A chooser of the item having the maximum value on an argument operation invoked on it.
      class  Min<T>
      A chooser of the minimum value between two comparable
      class  MinOnArgument<T,A>
      A chooser of the item having the minimum value on an argument operation invoked on it.
      class  PairAggregator<T>
      An aggregator that uses the definition of how to aggregate a pair of items and of the empty (idempotent respect to this aggregation) item.
      class  Sum
      An aggregator that sums numbers
      class  SumDouble
      An aggregator that sums doubles
      class  SumInteger
      An aggregator that sums ints
      class  SumLong
      An aggregator that sums longs
